LodUsersManagementStrings.cannotRemoveUs: Wannan mai amfani shi kaɗai babban mai gudanarwar wannan na'ura, kuma ba za a iya cire shi ba. Babban mai gudanarwa shi ke bayar da izini ko canja wurin zuwa wani mai amfani akan wannan na'urar idan ku na son cire wannan mai amfani.
Ba za a iya cire mai amfani ba
LodUsersManagementStrings.deviceLimitati: '{full_name} ({username})' shine admin kan '{device}'. Wannan na'ura an takaita ta ne ga masu koyo. Wasu masallaci masu koyo kawai. Maɓallan masu horaswa da admin zai bace.

'{full_name} ({username})' na'ura ce kan {non_admin_role} bisa '{device}'. Wannan na'ura an takaita ta. Maɓallan wannan an takaita su ne kawai ga masu koyo. Wasu Maɓallan masu horaswa da admin na za su samu ba.
